comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of May 20, 1917 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60C10FB395E11738... reports on her engagement to Howard Ogden Wood, Jr. Her father was Charles L. Hackstaff of 7 East 54th St., New York, NY www.mytrees.com/ancestry/Other/Born-1895/Ha/Hackstaff-fam... indicates that she was born in 1895 and her mother was Margaret Euphemia Hoffman

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: memory.loc.gov/service/sgp/sgpnyt/1916/191601/19160130/00... NYT from Jan 30, 1916 has another picture of her in a similar entertainment
